yenna-yasen : Ṛuḥet ɣer taddart yellan ɣer zdat, dinna aț-țafem taɣyult akk-d mmi-s, brut-asen-d, tawim-iyi-ten-id.
Ma yella win i wen-d-yennan kra, init-as : d Ssid-nneɣ i ten-iḥwaǧen, imiren a sen-d-iserreḥ.
Ayagi yedṛa-d am akken i t-id yenna nnbi Zakarya di tira iqedsen :
Init i wat wedrar n Siyun : AA taya ugellid-nwen iteddu-d ɣuṛ-wen s wannuz, irkeb-ed ɣef weɣyul amecṭuḥ mmi-s n teɣyult.
Inelmaden-nni ṛuḥen, xedmen ayen i sen-d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa.
Wwin-d taɣyult-nni d mmi-s, sburren-asen llebsa-nsen, dɣa srekben Sidna Ɛisa.
Aṭas n lɣaci ssan iceṭṭiḍen-nsen deg ubrid, wiyaḍ țṛuẓun-d tiseḍwa si ttjuṛ, țessun-tent ula d nutni deg ubrid.
Lɣaci yezwaren zdat Sidna Ɛisa d wid i t-id-iḍefṛen, țɛeggiḍen s lfeṛḥ qqaṛen : Ḥusana i mmi-s n Sidna Dawed ! Ițțubarek win i d-yusan s yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi ! Ḥusana deg imukan eɛlayen.
Mi gekcem Sidna Ɛisa ɣer temdint n Lquds, imezdaɣ meṛṛa nhewwalen, qqaṛen : Anwa-t wagi ?
Lɣaci-nni țțaran-asen : D Sidna Ɛisa, nnbi-nni n taddart n Naṣaret i d-yusan si tmurt n Jlili !
Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen, iqecceɛ meṛṛa wid yețțaɣen znuzun dinna deg ufrag n lǧameɛ. Iqleb-asen ṭṭwabel i wid yețbeddilen idrimen akk-d wid yeznuzun itbiren.
dɣa yenna-yasen : Yura : Axxam-iw ad ițțusemmi d axxam n tẓallit, ma d kunwi terram-t d lɣaṛ n imakaren.
Di lǧameɛ-nni, qeṛṛben-d ɣuṛ-es iderɣalen d iquḍaren, dɣa yesseḥla ten.
Lmuqedmin imeqqranen d lɛulama n ccariɛa rfan mi walan leɛǧayeb i gxeddem akk-d warrac ițɛeggiḍen di lǧameɛ : Ḥusana i mmi-s n Sidna Dawed !

Imiren nnan i Sidna Ɛisa : Tesliḍ d acu i d-qqaṛen ? SSidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Sliɣ ih ! Eɛni ur teɣṛim ara imeslayen-agi yuran di tira iqedsen : Tessufɣeḍ-ed leḥmadi seg imawen n warrac akk-d wid n llufanat iteṭṭḍen .
Imiren yeǧǧa-ten dinna, yeffeɣ si temdint, iṛuḥ ɣer taddart n Bitanya, dinna i gensa.
Azekka-nni taṣebḥit mi d-yuɣal ɣer temdint, Sidna Ɛisa yelluẓ ;

iwala yiwet n tneqleț rrif n webrid, iqeṛṛeb ɣuṛ-es, ur yufi deg-s acemma anagar afriwen ; dɣa yenna-yas : Seg wass-a, ur tețțuɣaleḍ ara a d-tefkeḍ lfakya ! IImiren kan, taneqleț-nni teqquṛ.
Inelmaden-is mi walan ayagi tɛeǧben, nnan : Amek akka teqquṛ tneqleț-agi deg yiwet n teswiɛt ?

Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : A wen-iniɣ tideț, ma yella tesɛam liman ur tețcukkum ara, aț-țizmirem aț-țxedmem akteṛ n wayen xedmeɣ i tneqleț-agi ! AAț-ținim i wedrar-agi qleɛ iman-ik syagi tḍeggṛeḍ iman-ik ɣer lebḥeṛ, ayagi a d-yedṛu !
Ayen akk ara tessutrem s liman di tẓallit, a wen-d-ițunefk !
Sidna Ɛisa yekcem ɣer lǧameɛ ibda yesselmad. Lmuqedmin akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud qeṛṛben ɣuṛ-es nnan-as : Ansi i k-d-tekka tezmert s wayes i txeddmeḍ ayagi ? Anwa i k-d-yefkan tazmert-agi ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : A wen-fkeɣ asteqsi ula d nekk, yiwen kan ; ma tǧawbem-iyi-d, ula d nekk a wen-iniɣ ansi i yi-d-tekka tezmert-agi.
Aɣḍas n Yeḥya, s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi i d-ikka neɣ s ɣuṛ yemdanen ? DDɣa bdan qqaṛen wway gar-asen : Ma nenna-yas seg igenwan, a ɣ-d-yini acuɣeṛ ihi ur tuminem ara yis,
ma nenna-yas daɣen seg imdanen, nuggad lɣaci-agi, axaṭer ḥesben akk Yeḥya d nnbi.
Dɣa nnan-as i Sidna Ɛisa : Ur neẓri ara ! YYerra-yasen : Ihi ula d nekk ur wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ara ansi i yi-d-tekka tezmert s wayes i xeddmeɣ ayagi !
D acu twalam ? Yiwen wergaz yesɛa sin warraw-is, yenṭeq ɣer umezwaru, yenna-yas : A mmi, ṛuḥ aț-țxedmeḍ ass-agi di tfeṛṛant-iw.
Yerra-yas : Ur țṛuḥuɣ ara ! MMeɛna yuɣal yendem, iṛuḥ ad ixdem di tfeṛṛant.
Yenna-yas daɣen i mmi-s wi sin ad iṛuḥ ad ixdem, yerra-yas-d : Ih a baba ad ṛuḥeɣ ! MMeɛna ur iṛuḥ ara.
Anwa deg sen i gxedmen lebɣi n baba-s ? RRran-as-ed : D amezwaru a Sidi ! SSidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : A wen-d-iniɣ tideț, imekkasen imakaren akk-d yir tilawin a kkun zwiren ɣer tgelda n igenwan !

Axaṭer Yeḥya yusa-d ɣuṛ-wen yesken-awen-d abrid n tideț, meɛna ur t-tuminem ara ; ma d imekkasen d yir tilawin umnen yis. Yerna ɣas akken twalam ayagi, ur d-tuɣalem ara ɣer webrid teggumam aț-țamnem yis.

A wen-d-rnuɣ daɣen lemtel nniḍen : yella yiwen umɛellem, yeẓẓa tafeṛṛant, izzi-yas-ed s zzeṛb, yeɣza amkan i tɛeṣṣart n tẓurin, yebna taɛrict i tɛessast, issekra tafeṛṛant-is i ixemmasen, imiren iṛuḥ ɣer lɣeṛba.
Mi d-yewweḍ lweqt n tẓurin, iceggeɛ iqeddacen-is ɣer ixemmasen nni iwakken a s-d-fken amur-is n lɣella.
Meɛna ixemmasen-nni ṭṭfen iqeddacen-nni, wa wten-t, wa nɣan-t, wayeḍ ṛejmen-t.
Iceggeɛ-asen daɣen tarbaɛt nniḍen n iqeddacen yugaren tamezwarut. Meɛna tedṛa yid-sen am imezwura-nni.
Taggara, iceggeɛ-asen mmi-s, yenna : Ahat imi d mmi a t-qadṛen !
Lameɛna mi walan mmi-s, ixemmasen-nni nnan wway gar-asen : Ataya win ara iweṛten, kkret a t-nenneɣ iwakken a nawi lweṛt-is.
Sṭfen-t, ḍeggṛen-t ɣer beṛṛa n tfeṛṛant, dɣa nɣan-t.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna i lɣaci : Ihi tura, m'ara d-yas bab n tfeṛṛant-nni, d acu ara sen-yexdem i ixemmasen-agi ?
Rran-as-ed : Ad ineɣ ixemmasen imcumen, ma ț-țafeṛṛant a ț-issekru i ixemmasen nniḍen ara s-d-ifken amur-is di lweqt n lɣella.

Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Leɛmeṛ teɣṛim imeslayen-agi i d-nnant tira iqedsen : Adɣaɣ-nni i ḍeggṛen wid ibennun, d nețța i guɣalen d azṛu alemmas , WWin yeṭṭfen lebni. AA yagi yekka-d s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi, d ayen i ɣ-istɛeǧben .
Daymi i wen-qqaṛeɣ : Tagelda n igenwan a wen tețwakkes, aț-țețțunefk i leǧnas nniḍen ara d-ifken lɣella.
Win ara yeɣlin ɣef wusalas-agi ad yerreẓ, daɣen win i ɣef ara d-yeɣli usalas-agi ad yețwamḥeq.
Mi slan i imeslayen-agi, ifariziyen d lmuqedmin imeqqranen fehmen belli fell-asen i d-iheddeṛ Sidna Ɛisa.
Meɛna ɣas akken bɣan a t-ṭṭfen, ur zmiren ara axaṭer uggaden lɣaci-nni i t-iḥesben d nnbi.
Sidna Ɛisa imeslay-asen-d daɣen s lemtel, yenna-yasen : --
Tagelda n igenwan tcuba ɣer yiwen ugellid i gxedmen tameɣṛa i mmi-s.
Iceggeɛ iqeddacen-is ad ssiwlen i wid yețwaɛeṛden, meɛna ugin a d-asen.
Yerna iceggeɛ-asen iqeddacen nniḍen a sen-inin : Heggaɣ imensi, zliɣ izgaren-iw d wakraren-iw, kullec ihegga, aset-ed ɣer tmeɣṛa !
Meɛna widak-nni ițwaɛeṛḍen ur s-fkin ara azal, yal yiwen yelha d ccɣel-is, wa iṛuḥ ɣer yiger-is, wa ɣer ssuq-is.
Wiyaḍ ṭṭfen iqeddacen-nni, regmen-ten, nɣan-ten.
Agellid-nni ikcem-it zzɛaf d ameqqran, dɣa iceggeɛ lɛeskeṛ-is nɣan iqettalen-nni, sseṛɣen tamdint-nsen.
Imiren yenna i iqeddacen-is : Imensi n tmeɣṛa ihegga, meɛna widak-nni ițwaɛeṛḍen ur t-uklalen ara ;
ṛuḥet ɣer izenqan, tɛeṛḍem-d ɣer tmeɣṛa wid akk ara tafem deg iberdan.
Iqeddacen-nni ṛuḥen ɣer izenqan jemɛen-d wid akk ufan, ama d amcum ama d win yelhan, s wakka axxam n tmeɣṛa yeččuṛ-ed d lɣaci.
Mi d-ikcem ugellid ad iwali inebgawen, iwala yiwen wergaz ur yelsi ara llebsa n tmeɣṛa.
yenna-yas : Ay amdakkel, amek i d-tkecmeḍ ɣer dagi mbla llebsa n tmeɣṛa yețwaheggan i yinebgawen ? AArgaz-nni yessusem, ur yufi d acu ara s-yini.
Agellid-nni yefka lameṛ i iqeddacen-is yenna-yasen : Cuddet-as ifassen d iḍaṛṛen, tḍeggṛem-t ɣer ṭṭlam n beṛṛa, anda llan imeṭṭawen d nndama tameqqrant.
Axaṭer aṭas i gețwaɛerḍen, meɛna drus ara yețwaqeblen.
Imiren ṛuḥen ifariziyen ad mcawaṛen amek ara d-sseɣlin Sidna Ɛisa deg wawal.

Ceggɛen-as kra seg inelmaden-nsen akk-d kra si terbaɛt n Hiṛudus, nnan-as : A Sidi, neẓra-k d bab n lḥeqq i telliḍ, tesselmadeḍ iberdan n Ṛebbi s tideț, ur tuggadeḍ ula d yiwen, ur txeddmeḍ ara lxilaf ger yemdanen.
Ini-yaɣ-d ihi d acu twalaḍ : d leḥlal neɣ d leḥṛam a nxelleṣ tabzert ( leɣṛama ) i ugellid Qayṣar (yestɛemṛen tamurt-nneɣ) ?
Meɛna Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran ayen i țxemmimen, yenna-yasen : Ay at sin wudmawen ! Acuɣeṛ tebɣam a yi-tjeṛbem ?
Seknet-iyi-d aṣurdi s wacu țxelliṣen tabzert ! FFkan-as-d aṣurdi n lfeṭṭa.
Dɣa isteqsa-ten : Udem akk-d tira yellan deg uṣuṛdi-agi, wi ten-ilan ?
Rran-as : N Qayṣer ! IImiren yenna-yasen : Erret ihi i Qayṣer ayen yellan n Qayṣer, terrem i Ṛebbi ayen yellan n Ṛebbi !
Mi slan i imeslayen-agi, wehmen, dɣa ṛuḥen ǧǧan-t.
Ass-nni, isaduqiyen i gellan d imdanen ur nețțamen ara s ḥeggu n lmegtin, usan-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa, steqsan-t, nnan-as :
A Sidi, Sidna Musa yenna-d : ma yella yemmut wergaz d amengur, ilaq gma-s ad yaɣ taǧǧalt-nni iwakken a d-isɛu yid-es dderya ara iweṛten gma-s-nni yemmuten.
Yuɣ lḥal llan ɣuṛ-nneɣ sebɛa watmaten, amezwaru izewǧen yemmut ur d-yeǧǧi dderya, dɣa gma-s yerra ( yuɣa ) tameṭṭut-nni.
Akkenni i tedṛa d wis sin, d wis tlata, armi d wis sebɛa.
Mi mmuten irkulli, temmut ula ț-țameṭṭut-nni ;
ass n ḥeggu n lmegtin anwa deg-sen ara ț-yesɛun ț-țameṭṭut-is imi i ț-uɣen di sebɛa yid-sen ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yasen : Tɣelṭem ! Axaṭer ur tefhimem tira iqedsen, ur tessinem tazmert n Ṛebbi.
Ass n ḥeggu n lmegtin, irgazen ț-țilawin ur zeggjen ara, meɛna ad uɣalen am lmalayekkat deg igenni.
Ɣef wayen yeɛnan ḥeggu n lmegtin, ur teɣṛim ara acu i d-yenna Sidi Ṛebbi ? :
D nekk i d Illu n Ibṛahim, n Isḥaq, n Yeɛqub. Sidi Ṛebbi mačči d Ṛebbi n lmegtin, meɛna d Ṛebbi n wid yeddren.
Mi s-slan, lɣaci qqimen țweḥḥiden deg imeslayen-is !
Mi slan ifariziyen belli Sidna Ɛisa yeɣleb isaduqiyen deg wawal, nnejmaɛen wway gar-asen.
Yiwen seg-sen d lɛalem n ccariɛa, isteqsa-t iwakken a t-ijeṛṛeb :
A Sidi, anwa i d lameṛ ameqqran meṛṛa di ccariɛa ?
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : -- Aț-țḥemleḍ Illu Sidi Ṛebbi-inek seg wul-ik, s teṛwiḥt-ik, s wayen yellan di tezmert-ik.
D wagi i d lameṛ yellan d amezwaru yerna d ameqqran akk di ccariɛa.
Atan wayeḍ yesɛan azal annect umezwaru-agi : Aț-țḥemleḍ lɣiṛ-ik am yiman-ik.
D sin lumuṛat-agi i d lsas n ccariɛa akk-d lenbiya.
Mi llan ifariziyen nnejmaɛen, Sidna Ɛisa isteqsa-ten yenna :
D acu ara d-tinim ɣef Lmasiḥ ? Ansi ara d-yekk, yeɛni anwi i d lejdud-is ? NNnan-as : D mmi-s n Sidna Dawed.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Amek ihi i s-isemma Dawed s tezmert n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen « Sidi » mi genna :
Sidi Ṛebbi yenna i Ssid-iw : ṭṭef amkan ɣer tama-w tayeffust, alamma rriɣ iɛdawen-ik seddaw iḍaṛṛen-ik.
Ma yella ihi Dawed yessawel-as « Sidi » amek ara yili ihi d mmi-s ?
Yiwen deg-sen ur izmir a s-d yerr awal, seg wass-nni țțaggaden a t-steqsin.
Imiren Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq ɣer lɣaci d inelmaden-is yenna yasen :
Lɛulama d ifariziyen sselmaden ccariɛa n Musa.
Xedmet ayen akk ara wen-d-inin, meɛna ur xeddmet ara wayen xeddmen nutni, axaṭer ayen i d-qqaṛen ur t-xeddmen ara.
Țcuddun tiɛekkmin ẓẓayen țɛebbin-tent ɣef tuyat n yemdanen, ma d nutni țțagin a ten-ɛiwnen ula s yixef n iḍuḍan-nsen.
Ayen akk i xeddmen, xeddmen-t iwakken a ten-walin yemdanen, țɛelliqen tiḥerztin ț-țeɣṛisin ɣef yiman-nsen.
Ḥemmlen ad ṭṭfen imukan imezwura ama di tmeɣṛiwin ama di leǧwameɛ, ḥemmlen m'ara țsellimen fell-asen yemdanen di tejmuyaɛ akk-d leswaq ;
ḥemmlen daɣen m'ara sen-qqaṛen yemdanen : « a Sidi ».
Ma d kunwi ɣuṛ-wat a wen qqaṛen : « a Sidi » axaṭer d atmaten i tellam yerna yiwen kan i d Ssid-nwen.
Ur qqaṛet ula i yiwen di ddunit : « Baba » axaṭer anagar yiwen i d baba-wen, d Baba Ṛebbi yellan deg igenwan.
Ur qebblet ara aț-țețțusemmim : « imeqqranen » axaṭer anagar yiwen i d ameqqran : d Lmasiḥ !
Ameqqran deg-wen, d win iqeddcen fell-awen.
Kra n win issimɣuṛen iman-is a d-yers, ma d win issimẓiyen iman is ad ițwarfed !
A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa, ay at sin wudmawen ! AAxaṭer tmeddlem tiwwura n igenwan i yemdanen, ur tkeččmem kunwi, ur tețțaǧǧam ad kecmen wid yebɣan !

A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa, ay at sin wudmawen ! Axaṭer tettețțem ayla n tuǧǧal, tesṭuqqutem awal di tẓallit-nwen iwakken a d-tesbegnem iman-nwen telham. Ɣef wayagi, lɛiqab i kkun-ițṛaǧun d ameqqran !

A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa, ay at sin udmawen ! Tețnadim timura, tzeggrem lebḥuṛ iwakken a d-rebḥem ɣas ula d yiwen ɣer ddin i tettabaɛem; mi t-id-rnam ɣuṛ-wen, tețțaram-t d win yuklalen ǧahennama akteṛ-nwen !

A nnger-nwen ay iderɣalen iteṭṭfen afus i wiyaḍ ! Teqqaṛem : « Ma yella yeggul bunadem s lǧameɛ iqedsen, ɣas yeḥnet ulac fell-as ; ma d win ara yegallen s ddheb yellan di lǧameɛ, ur s-ilaq ara ad iḥnet, ilaq ad iṭṭef di limin-ines ! »
Ay imehbal, ay iderɣalen ! D acu i gesɛan azal, d ddheb neɣ d lǧameɛ i gețțarran ddheb-nni d imqeddes ?
Teqqaṛem daɣen : « Win ara yegallen s udekkan n iseflawen, ɣas iḥnet ulac fell-as, ma d win ara yegallen s iseflawen nni, ur s-ilaq ara ad iḥnet, ilaq ad iṭṭef di limin-ines.»
Ay iderɣalen ! Anwa i gesɛan azal, d iseflawen neɣ d udekkan-nni i gerran iseflawen d imqedsen ?
Win ara yegallen s udekkan n iseflawen, yeggul s udekkan-nni d wayen akk yersen fell-as.
Win ara yegallen daɣen s lǧameɛ, yeggul s lǧameɛ akk-d Win i gellan deg-s.
Win ara yegallen s igenwan, yeggul daɣen s igenwan akk-d Sidi Ṛebbi iḥekkmen deg-sen.

A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa, ay at sin udmawen ! tețțakem leɛcuṛ ɣef nneɛneɛ, abesbas d lkemmun, lameɛna tețțaǧǧam ɣer deffir lḥeqq, ṛṛeḥma d laman. DD annect-agi i gețṛaǧu deg-wen Sidi Ṛebbi aț-țezwirem deg-sen a ten-txedmem, mbla ma terram deg idis ayen nniḍen.
Ay iderɣalen iteṭṭfen afus i wiyaḍ ! Tețṣeffim tissit-nwen ɣef yizi, tesseblaɛem alɣem.
A nnger-wen ay ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa, ay at sin wudmawen ! Axaṭer tessizdigem taqbuct d uḍebsi s ufella kan, meɛna ɣer daxel-nsen ččuṛen ț-țukeṛdiwin d ṭṭmeɛ.
Ay afarizi aderɣal ! Ssizdeg uqbel daxel n teqbuct d uḍebsi, iwakken ula s ufella-nsen ad izdigen !
A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa, ay at sin udmawen ! TTețțemcabim ɣer iẓekwan isebɣen s lǧir ; s ufella cebḥen, ɣer daxel ččuṛen d iɣsan n lmegtin d rekku.
Akka ula d kunwi, tețbegginem-d iman-nwen telham ɣer yemdanen, lameɛna zdaxel teččuṛem d leɣruṛ d cceṛ.
A nnger-nwen ay ifariziyen d lɛulama n ccariɛa, ay at sin wudmawen ! Tbennum iẓekwan n lenbiya, tețcebbiḥem iẓekwan n wid iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi,
teqqaṛem lemmer i nɛac di zzman n lejdud-nneɣ, tili ur neqbil ara a nțekki yid-sen deg ussizel n idammen n lenbiya.
S wakka tețcehhidem belli kunwi ț-țarwa n wid ineqqen lenbiya
yerna kunwi tețkemmilem ayen xedmen lejdud-nwen !
A ccetla n izerman ! Amek ara tmenɛem si lɛiqab n ǧahennama ?

Daymi ara wen-d-ceggɛeɣ lenbiya, imusnawen akk-d lɛulama. KKra seg-sen a ten-tenɣem, kra a ten-tsemmṛem ɣef wumidag, kra nniḍen a ten-tejlekḍem di leǧwameɛ nwen yerna a ten-tețqehhiṛem si temdint ɣer tayeḍ.
Ihi, idammen n iḥeqqiyen yuzzlen di lqaɛa, si Habil aḥeqqi mmi-s n Adem armi d Zakarya mmi-s n Birikya, i tenɣam ger lǧameɛ iqedsen d udekkan iseflawen, a d-uɣalen ɣer yiri-nwen.
A wen-d-iniɣ tideț : ayagi meṛṛa a d-yeɣli ɣef lǧil-agi !

A tamdint n Lquds ! A tamdint n Lquds ineqqen lenbiya, ireǧǧmen wid i m-d-ițuceggɛen s ɣuṛ Ṛebbi, acḥal n tikkal i bɣiɣ a d-jemɛeɣ arraw-im akken tjemmeɛ tyaziṭ ifṛax-is ddaw wafriwen-is, meɛna tegummaḍ !
Ihi atan wexxam-im ad yexlu !
Axaṭer aql-i a wen-iniɣ : ur tețțuɣalem ara a yi-twalim, alamma d ass i deg ara d-tinim : Yețțubarek win i d-yusan s yisem n Sidi Ṛebbi !
Mi d-iffeɣ si lǧameɛ iqedsen, Sidna Ɛisa iteddu ad iṛuḥ. Inelmaden-is qeṛṛben-d ɣuṛ-es, țwehhin-as iwakken ad yerr ddehn-is ɣer cbaḥa akk-d lebni n lǧameɛ iqedsen.
Meɛna Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Twalam annect-agi meṛṛa ? A wen-iniɣ tideț : ur d-yețɣimi wezṛu ɣef wayeḍ, kullec ad ihudd.
Yuli ɣer yiɣil n uzemmur iqqim weḥd-es, inelmaden-is usan-d a t-steqsin nnan-as : Melmi ara d-idṛu wayen i d tenniḍ, amek ara neɛqel ass ameqqran n tuɣalin-ik akk-d taggara n ddunit ?
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Ɣuṛ-wat win ara wen-ikellxen !
Axaṭer aṭas n yemdanen ara d-yasen s yisem-iw, a d-inin : «` D nekk i d Lmasiḥ ! » Yerna ad kellxen aṭas n lɣaci.
Aț-țeslem s ṭradat ț-țegrawliwin, meɛna ɣuṛ-wat a kkun-iffeɣ leɛqel. Ur țțaggadet ara, axaṭer ilaq a d-yedṛu wannect-a, meɛna mazal mačči d nnger n ddunit.
Agdud ad yennaɣ d wayeḍ, tagelda aț-țeẓdem ɣef tayeḍ, a d-yili laẓ d zzelzlat deg waṭas n imukan.
Ayagi akk ara yedṛun, ad yili am lqeṛḥ amezwaru n tmeṭṭut iṭṭfen addud.
Imiren a kkun-fken iwakken aț-țețțuɛetbem, a kkun-nɣen, leǧnas meṛṛa a kkun-keṛhen ɣef ddemma n yisem-iw.
Aṭas ara yeǧǧen liman-nsen, ad msekṛahen, ad țemyexdaɛen wway gar-asen.
A d-nnulfun lenbiya n lekdeb, ad ɣuṛṛen aṭas n lɣaci,
simmal ad yețzad lbaṭel, simmal lmaḥibba n waṭas n yemdanen aț-țenqes.
Ma d win ara yeṭṭfen di liman-is alamma ț-țaggara, ad ițțusellek.
Lexbaṛ-agi n lxiṛ ɣef tgelda n Sidi Ṛebbi, ad ițțubecceṛ di ddunit meṛṛa iwakken leǧnas ad slen yis. Imiren ara d-taweḍ taggara n ddunit.
M'ara twalim deg wemkan iqedsen win iwumi semman lmuṣiba issengaren i ɣef d-ihḍeṛ nnbi Danyel ; ( win ara yeɣṛen taktabt-agi n nnbi Danyel ad ifhem !)
Imiren, wid ara yilin di tmurt n Yahuda ilaq ad rewlen ɣer idurar,
win ara yilin s ufella n ssqef, ur ilaq ara ad ikcem ɣer wexxam iwakken a d-iddem lqecc-is,
win daɣen ara yilin di lexla, ur ilaq ara ad yuɣal ɣer deffir iwakken a d-iddem abeṛnus-is !
A tawaɣit n tilawin ara yilin s tadist akk-d țid ara yessuṭuḍen deg ussan-nni !
Dɛut ɣer Ṛebbi iwakken tarewla agi-nwen ur d-tdeṛṛu ara di ccetwa neɣ deg wass n westeɛfu.
Axaṭer « ad yili yiwen n leɛtab ur d-nelli seg wasmi d-tebda ddunit ar ass-a yerna ur ițțuɣal ara a d-yili ! »
Lemmer ur issenqes ara Sidi Ṛebbi deg wussan-nni, tili yiwen ur imenneɛ, meɛna ɣef ddemma n wid yextaṛ ara yeṣṣenqes i wussan-agi.
Imiren ma yenna-yawen-d yiwen : Lmasiḥ atan dagi neɣ atan, dihin, ur țțamnet ara !
Axaṭer a d-asen wid ara yerren iman-nsen d Lmasiḥ neɣ d lenbiya, ad xedmen lbeṛhanat d leɛǧayeb akk-d licaṛat iwakken ad kelxen ma zemren ula d wid yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Atan nniɣ-awen-t-id ihi :
ma nnan-awen Lmasiḥ atan deg unezṛuf, ur țṛuḥut ara, neɣ ma nnan-awen walit, atan deg umkan-ihin yeffren, ur țțamnet ara.
Axaṭer asm'ara d-yas Mmi-s n bunadem, ad yili am tafat n lbeṛeq m'ara d-tfeǧǧeǧ si cceṛq alamma d lɣeṛb.
Anda yella umuṛḍus ( lǧifa ), dinna ara nnejmaɛen igudar.
M'ara ɛeddin wussan-nni n leɛtab, iṭij ad inqes, aggur ur d-ițțak ara tiziri-ines, itran a d-ɣlin seg igenni, tizmar n igenwan ad rgagint.

Imiren a d-iban Mmi-s n bunadem deg igenni, leɛṛac meṛṛa n ddunit ad meǧden, a d wwten deg idmaren-nsen m'ara walin Mmi-s n bunadem deg igenwan, yusa-d ɣef wusigna s tezmert akk-d lɛaḍima tameqqrant.
A d-iceggeɛ lmalayekkat-is ad berrḥent s ṣṣut n lbuq, a d snejmaɛent wid akk yextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, si yal amkan, seg ixef n ddunit ɣer wayeḍ.
Meyzet ɣef lemtel n tneqleț : mi lqaqit isegman-is, fsan wafriwen-is, teḥsam yewweḍ-d unebdu !
Ula d kunwi, m'ara twalim yewweḍ-ed wannect-agi meṛṛa, ḥṣut belli Mmi-s n bunadem ițeddu-d, atan ɣer tewwurt.
A wen-d-iniɣ tideț : lǧil-agi ur ițɛedday ara alamma ideṛṛu-d wannect agi meṛṛa.
Igenni d lqaɛa ad fnun, ma d imeslayen-iw ur fennun ara !
Meɛna ɣef wayen yeɛnan ass neɣ ssaɛa n wannect-agi meṛṛa, yiwen ur ten-issin, ama d lmalayekkat n igenwan, ama d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi, anagar Baba Ṛebbi i geẓran.
Am akken i tedṛa di zzman n nnbi Nuḥ, akken daɣen ara tedṛu di lweqt n Mmi-s n bunadem.
Axaṭer deg ussan-nni uqbel a d-neflen waman ɣef ddunit, imdanen llan tețțen, tessen, țemyezwaǧen, zeggjen i warraw-nsen, armi d ass i deg yekcem nnbi Nuḥ ɣer lbabuṛ.
Yiwen ur ifaq s wacemma armi d-ḥemlen waman i ten-yewwin, snegren-ten akk. AAkken ara tedṛu di lweqt n tuɣalin n Mmi-s n bunadem !
Imiren, ger sin yergazen ara yilin deg iger, yiwen ad ițwarfed wayeḍ a d-iqqim.
Ger snat n tilawin yeẓẓaden s tsirt, yiwet aț-țețwarfed tayeḍ a d-teqqim !
Ɛasset ihi ur ɣefflet ara ! Axaṭer ur teẓrim ara lweqt i deg ara d-yas Ssid-nwen !
Rret ddehn-nwen ɣer wayagi : lemmer yeẓri bab n wexxam lweqt i deg ara d-yas umakar, tili ad iɛiwez ur iggan ara, iwakken ur t-țțakren ara.
Daymi ula d kunwi heggit iman-nwen axaṭer di lweqt i ɣef ur tebnim ara, ara d-yas Mmi-s n bunadem.
Anwa i d aqeddac aɛeqli i ɣef ara yețkel bab n wexxam ? D win ara iwekkel ɣef wat wexxam-is meṛṛa, iwakken a sen-yefk lqut-nsen di lawan.
Amarezg n uqeddac-agi ara d-yaf bab n wexxam m'ara d-yaweḍ, yelha d ccɣel-nni.
A wen-iniɣ tideț : a t-yerr d lewkil ɣef wayla-s meṛṛa !
Meɛna ma yella axeddam-agi diri-t, ad yini deg ul-is : bab n wexxam iɛeṭṭel, mazal ur d-ițas ara ;
dɣa ad ibdu ad ikkat iqeddacen n wexxam-nni, ad iteț, ad itess nețța d isekṛanen.
Bab n wexxam a d-yas deg wass i ɣef ur ibni ara uqeddac-nni, di lawan ur yeẓri.
A t-iqecceɛ, a t-iɛaqeb akken țwaɛaqben at sin udmawen : imiren ara yilin imeṭṭawen d nndama tameqqrant.
Daymi deg wussan-nni, tagelda n igenwan aț-țecbu ɣer ɛecṛa telmeẓyin i geddmen tiftilin-nsent iwakken ad ṛuḥent ad mmagrent isli.
Xemsa seg-sent ț-țuḥṛicin, xemsa nniḍen ț-țungifin.
Mi d-ddment tungifin-nni tiftilin nsent, ur d-wwint ara zzit yid-sent.
Ma ț-țuḥṛicin-nni, wwint-ed yid-sent tiqbucin n zzit.
Imi i gɛeṭṭel yesli, tilmeẓyin-nni nuddment dɣa ṭsent.
Di tlemmast n yiḍ, yiwet n taɣect tɛeggeḍ-ed : Ataya yesli iteddu-d, ffɣemt a t-temmagremt !
Imiren kan ukint-ed akk telmeẓyin-nni, heggant tiftilin-nsent.
Tungifin-nni nnant i tuḥṛicin : Fkemt-aɣ-d kra si zzit-nkunt, tiftilin-nneɣ qṛib ad xsint.
Tuḥṛicin rrant-asent : Ulamek, ur aɣ-d-tkeffu ara i nekkunti d kunemti, ṛuḥemt a d taɣemt i yiman-nkunt ɣer wid yeznuzun.
Mi ṛuḥent a d-aɣent, isli yewweḍ-ed, tuḥṛicin-nni iheggan iman-nsent kecment yid-es ɣer wexxam n tmeɣṛa, dɣa rran-d tawwurt.
Mi i d-wwḍent tungifin-nni, bdant țɛeggiḍent : A Sidi, a Sidi ldi-yaɣ-d tawwurt.
Meɛna nețța yerra-yasent-ed : A kunt-iniɣ tideț : ur kkunt ssineɣ ara !
Daymi a wen-iniɣ : Ɛasset, imi ur teẓrim ass, ur teẓrim lweqt.
Ass n tuɣalin n Mmi-s n bunadem ad yili daɣen am yiwen wergaz i gțeddun ad iṛuḥ ɣer lɣeṛba, yesnejmaɛ-ed iqeddacen-is, iwekkel iten ɣef wayen akk yesɛa.
Ifka i umezwaru xemsmeyya twiztin n ddheb, wi sin yefka-yas mitin, wis tlata yefka-yas meyya ; yefka i yal yiwen s wakken tella tezmert-is, dɣa iṛuḥ.
Imiren kan, aqeddac-nni iwumi yefka xemsmeyya twiztin, iṛuḥ yetjeṛ yis-sent, irbeḥ-ed xemsmeyya nniḍen.
Ula d win iwumi yefka mitin, ixdem akken, irbeḥ-ed mitin nniḍen.
Ma d win iwumi yefka meyya, iṛuḥ yeɣza di lqaɛa, yeffer tiwiztin-nni i s-d-ifka umɛellem-is.
Mi gɛedda lweqt, yuɣal-ed umɛellem-nni, isnejmaɛ-iten-id iwakken ad imḥasab yid-sen.
Win akken iwumi yefka xemsmeyya twiztin, yusa-d yewwi-d yid-es xemsmeyya twiztin nniḍen, yenna-yas : A Sidi tefkiḍ-iyi-d xemsmeyya twiztin n ddheb, a tent-ih xemsmeyya nniḍen i d-rebḥeɣ yis-sent.
Amɛellem-is yenna-yas : D ayen yelhan i txedmeḍ ay aqeddac unṣiḥ, imi deg-ek laman ɣef tɣawsiwin timecṭuḥin, sya d asawen a k-wekkleɣ ɣef timeqqranin ! Ili-k di lfeṛḥ yid-i !
Aqeddac-nni iwumi yefka mitin twiztin n ddheb, iqeṛṛeb-ed ula d nețța, yenna-yas : A Sidi tefkiḍ-iyi mitin twiztin n ddheb, a tent-ih mitin nniḍen i d-rebḥeɣ yis-sent.
Amɛellem-is yenna-yas : D ayen yelhan i txedmeḍ, ay aqeddac unṣiḥimi deg-k laman ɣef tɣawsiwin timecṭuḥin, sya d asawen a k-wekkleɣ ɣef timeqqranin ! Ili-k di lfeṛḥ yid-i !
Iwweḍ-ed win akken iwumi yefka meyya twiztin, yenna yas : A Sidi ẓriɣ-k d argaz iweɛṛen, tmeggreḍ anda ur tezriɛeḍ, tjemmɛeḍ seg wennar ayen ur tesrewteḍ ,
dɣa uggadeɣ-k, daymi i ṛuḥeɣ ffreɣ deg wakal tiwiztin-nni i yi-tefkiḍ. Atan wayla-k, ddem-it !
Amɛellem-is yenna-yas : Ay aqeddac amcum, ameɛdaz ! Imi iyi-teẓriḍ meggreɣ-d anda ur zriɛeɣ, jemmɛeɣ-ed daɣen anda ur srewteɣ,
acuɣeṛ ihi ur tessekraḍ ara idrimin-iw iwakken m'ara d-uɣaleɣ a ten-id-erreɣ s lfayda.
Imiren amɛellem-nni yumeṛ i iqeddacen-is yenna-yasen : Kkset-as meyya-nni twiztin ternum-tent i win yesɛan ɛecṛa alef n twiztin !
Axaṭer kra win yesɛan, a s-nernu ad yili di tawant, ma d win ur nesɛi ara, a s-nekkes ula d ayen yesɛa.
Ma d aqeddac-agi ur nemɛin, ḍeggṛet-eț ɣer ṭṭlam n beṛṛa anda ara yilin imeṭṭawen d nndama tameqqrant.
Asm'ara d-yas Mmi-s n bunadem di tmanegt-is nețța d lmalayekkat meṛṛa, ad iḥkem di lɛaḍima-s ;
leǧnas meṛṛa a d-nnejmaɛen zdat-es, a ten-ifṛeq am umeksa iɛeSlen ulli ɣef tɣeṭṭen.
Ad yerr ulli ɣer uyeffus-is, tiɣeṭṭen ɣer uzelmaḍ-is.
Imiren agellid ad yini i wid yellan ɣer uyeffus-is : Aset-ed a kunwi iburek Baba, aț-țweṛtem tagelda i wen-ițțuheggan seg wasmi i tebda ddunit.
Axaṭer lliɣ lluẓeɣ tefkam-iyi ččiɣ, ffudeɣ tefkam-iyi swiɣ, usiɣ-ed d abeṛṛani testeṛḥbem yis-i,
lliɣ d aɛeryan tesselsem-iyi, d amuḍin telham-d yid-i, lliɣ daɣen d ameḥbus tusam-d teẓram-iyi.
Imiren iḥeqqiyen a s-d-rren : A Sidi melmi i k-neẓra telluẓeḍ, nefka-yak teččiḍ ? Neɣ neẓra-k teffuḍeḍ nefka-yak teswiḍ ?
Melmi daɣen i d-tusiḍ d abeṛṛani nesṭeṛḥeb yis-ek, neɣ melmi i k-nwala d aɛeryan, nessels-ik ?
Melmi i k-neẓra d amuḍin neɣ di lḥebs nusa-d ɣuṛ-ek ?
Agellid a sen-d-yerr : A wen-iniɣ tideț, yal tikkelt i deg txedmem ayagi i yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi yellan d atmaten-iw, i nekk iwumi t-txedmem.
Imiren ad yini i wid yellan ɣer uẓelmaḍ-is : Beɛdet akkin fell-i a kunwi yețwaneɛlen, ṛuḥet ɣer tmes n dayem yețwaheggan i Cciṭan d wid i t- tebɛen.
Axaṭer lliɣ lluẓeɣ ur iyi tesseččem ara, ffudeɣ ur iyi-tefkim ara ad sweɣ,
usiɣ-ed d abeṛṛani ur tesṭerḥbem ara yis-i, lliɣ d aɛeryan ur iyi tesselsem ara, lliɣ daɣen d amuḍin, d ameḥbus, ur d-tusim ara aț-țesteqsim fell-i.
Imiren ula d nutni a s-d-rren : A Sidi, melmi i k-neẓra telluẓeḍ neɣ teffudeḍ d abeṛṛani neɣ d aɛeryan, d amuḍin neɣ d ameḥbus, ur d-nelhi ara yid-ek ?
Nețța a sen-d-yerr : A wen-iniɣ tideț : yal tikkelt i deg ur texdimem ara ayagi i yiwen seg imecṭuḥen-agi, i nekk iwumi ur t-texdimem ara.
Imiren widak-agi ad kecmen ɣer lɛiqab ur nfennu, ma d iḥeqqiyen ad kecmen ɣer tudert n dayem !
Mi gfukk Sidna Ɛisa imeslayen-agi, yenna i inelmaden-is : --
Mazal sin wussan i lɛid n Tuffɣa, Mmi-s n bunadem ad ițțuzenz iwakken ad ițuṣemmer ɣef wumidag.
Dɣa lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud nnejmaɛen deg ufrag n Kayef, i gellan d lmuqeddem ameqqran.
Msefhamen ad ṭṭfen Sidna Ɛisa s tḥila iwakken a t-nɣen.
Meɛna nnan : « mačči deg ussan-agi n lɛid n Tuffɣa ara t-neḥbes, neɣ m'ulac ad yekker ccwal ger lɣaci .»
Mi gella Sidna Ɛisa di taddart n Bitanya, deg wexxam n Semɛun abeṛsi,
ațaya yiwet n tmeṭṭut tewwi-d tabuqalt yețwaxedmen s wedɣaɣ amellal, teččuṛ d leɛṭeṛ ɣlayen. Mi geqqim Sidna Ɛisa ɣer ṭṭabla, tameṭṭut-nni tusa-d tesmar leɛṭeṛ-nni ɣef wuqeṛṛuy-is.
Mi walan ayagi, inelmaden iɣaḍ-iten lḥal, nnan : Iwumi lexsaṛa-yagi ?
Lemmer nezzenz leɛṭeṛ-nni, tili yewwi-d ssuma tameqqrant ara nefṛeq i igellilen !
Sidna Ɛisa yeẓran wayen nnan wway-gar-asen, yenna-yasen : Acuɣeṛ i tesḥeznem tameṭṭut agi ? D ayen yelhan i yi-texdem !
Axaṭer aț-țesɛum daymen igellilen yid-wen, meɛna nekk ur țțiliɣ ara daymen yid-wen.
Mi d-tesmar leɛṭeṛ-agi fell-i, d lǧețța-w i thegga i temḍelt-iw.
A wen-iniɣ tideț : di yal amkan n ddunit i deg ara ițțubecceṛ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ, a d țmektayen tameṭṭut-agi d wayen texdem.
Imiren Yudas n Qeṛyut, yiwen si tnac-nni inelmaden n Sidna Ɛisa, iṛuḥ ɣer lmuqedmin imeqqranen,
yenna yasen : Ma wwiɣ-kkun ɣuṛ-es a t-id teṭṭfem, d acu ara yi-tefkem ? FFkan-as tlatin iṣurdiyen n lfeṭṭa.
Seg imiren, Yudas yețɛassa tagniț i deg ara yizmir ad izzenz Sidna Ɛisa.
Ass amezwaru n lɛid n weɣṛum mbla iɣes n temtunt , inelmaden usan-d ɣer Sidna Ɛisa nnan-as : A Sidi, anda tebɣiḍ a k-nheggi imensi n lɛid n Izimer n leslak ?
Yerra-yasen : Ṛuḥet ɣer temdint, ɣer leflani, init-as : yenna-yak Ssid-nneɣ, lweqt-iw yewweḍ-ed, deg uxxam-ik ara sɛeddiɣ lɛid n Izimer n leslak nekk d inelmaden-iw.
Inelmaden-nni xedmen ayen i sen-yenna Sidna Ɛisa, heggan imensi n lɛid n Izimer n leslak.
Mi d-teɣli tmeddit, Sidna Ɛisa yeqqim ad yečč nețța d inelmaden-is.
Mi llan tețțen yenna-yasen : A wen-iniɣ tideț : yiwen seg-wen ad iyi-izzenz.
Mi d-yenna ayagi, ikcem-iten akk leḥzen d ameqqran, bdan qqaṛen as yiwen yiwen : Neɣ mačči d nekk a Sidi ?
Yerra-yasen : Win igren afus-is yid-i deg uḍebsi, d nețța ara yi-izzenzen.
Ad yedṛu d Mmi-s n bunadem akken yura fell-as ; mmeɛna a nnger n win ara t-izzenzen, lemmer ur d-ilul ara axiṛ-is.
Yudas ara t-ixedɛen yenṭeq yenna-yas : Eɛni d nekk a Sidi ? SSidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Atan tenniḍ-t-id !
Mi llan tețțen, Sidna Ɛisa yeddem-d aɣṛum, iḥmed Ṛebbi, icekkeṛ-it, dɣa yebḍa-t, ifṛeq-it i inelmaden-is, yenna-yasen : Eččet aɣṛum-agi : d lǧețța-w.
Iddem-ed daɣen taqbuct, iḥmed Ṛebbi, icekkeṛ-it, yefka-yasen-ț, yenna-yasen : Swet akk si teqbuct-agi,
axaṭer ayagi d idammen-iw, d idammen n lemɛahda ara yazzlen ɣef yizumal n lɣaci ɣef ddemma n leɛfu n ddnubat-nsen.
A wen-d-iniɣ : ur țțuɣaleɣ ara ad sweɣ seg waman-agi n tẓurin alamma d ass i deg ara ten-sweɣ d ijdiden yid-wen, di tgelda n Baba Ṛebbi.
Mi ḥemden Sidi Ṛebbi s ccnawi d isefra, ṛuḥen ulin ɣer yiɣil n uzemmur,
dinna Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasen : Iḍ-agi ad a wen-iliɣ akk d sebba n tuccḍa, axaṭer yura di tira iqedsen ad wwteɣ ameksa, ulli n tqeḍɛit-is ad rewlent ɣer yal tama .
Meɛna m'ara d-ḥyuɣ si ger lmegtin, ad iyi-tafem zwareɣ ɣer tmurt n Jlili.
Buṭrus yenṭeq, yenna : Ɣas a sen-tiliḍ d sebba n tuccḍa i wiyaḍ akk, nekk d lmuḥal ad ccḍeɣ.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : A k-iniɣ tideț : deg iḍ-agi uqbel ad iskkuɛ uyaziḍ, ad iyi-tnekṛeḍ tlata iberdan.
Buṭrus yerra-yas : Ɣas lukan d lmut ara mmteɣ yid-ek, d lmuḥal a k-nekkṛeɣ ! UUla d inelmaden nniḍen, nnan-as am nețța.
Imiren Sidna Ɛisa iṛuḥ yid-sen ɣer yiwen wemkan ițțusemman Jitsimani, yenna i inelmaden-is : Qqimet dagi, nekk ad ṛuḥeɣ ad dɛuɣ ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Yewwi yid-es Buṭrus akk-d sin warraw-nni n Zabadi ; yebda ikcem-it leḥzen d leɣben d ameqqran.
Dɣa yenna-yasen : Ḥusseɣ s leḥzen n lmut, qqimet dagi, ɛiwzet yid-i !
Iṛuḥ yeɣli ɣef wudem, ibda yețẓalla yeqqaṛ : A Baba Ṛebbi, ma yella wamek , ssebɛed fell-i leɛtab-agi ! Meɛna akken tebɣiḍ keččini, mačči akken bɣiɣ nekkini.
Yuɣal-ed ɣer inelmaden-is, yufa-ten-id ṭṭsen, yenna i Buṭrus : Ur tezmirem ara aț-țɛiwzem yid-i ula d yiwet n ssaɛa ?
Ɛiwzet, ẓallet, iwakken ur tɣellim ara deg ujeṛṛeb ! Axaṭer ṛṛuḥ n wemdan yeǧhed ma d lǧețța ur tezmir ara !
Ibɛed akkin tikkelt tis snat iwakken ad iẓẓal, yenna : A Baba, ma yella ulamek ara tesbeɛdeḍ fell-i leɛtab-agi , ma ilaq ad iyi-d-yaweḍ ! Ad yedṛu lebɣi-k !
Mi d-yuɣal, yufa-ten-id daɣen ṭṭsen, iɣleb-iten nuddam.
Yeǧǧa-ten, issebɛed iman-is daɣen fell-asen, yedɛa tikkelt tis tlata am tikkelt-nni tamezwarut.
Mi d-yuɣal ɣer inelmaden-is, yufa-ten-id mazal-iten ṭṭsen ; yenna yasen : Lweqt i deg ara yețwasellem Mmi-s n bunadem ɣer ifassen n yemcumen iwweḍ-ed, kunwi mazal ikkun teṭṭsem ?
Dɣa yenna-yasen : Ekkret fell-awen, ataya iteddu-d win i yi-izzenzen !
Mazal-it ițmeslay mi d-iwweḍ Yudas yellan d yiwen si tnac-nni inelmaden. Ddan-d yid-es aṭas n lɣaci s iɛekkzan d ijenwiyen, ceggɛen ten-id imeqqranen n lmuqedmin akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud.
Win akken i t-izzenzen, imsefham yid-sen, yenna-yasen : Win i ɣef ara selmeɣ, d win ara teṭṭfem !
Imiren, iqeṛṛeb ɣer Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Sslam fell-ak a Sidi ! DDɣa isellem fell-as.
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yas : Ay amdakkel , ayen ɣef i d-tusiḍ a t-txedmeḍ, xdem-it ! DDɣa lɣaci-nni qeṛṛben ɣer Sidna Ɛisa ṭṭfen-t.
Yiwen seg wid yeddan d Sidna Ɛisa ijbed-ed ajenwi-ines, yewwet aqeddac n lmuqeddem ameqqran, igzem-as-d ameẓẓuɣ-is.
Sidna Ɛisa yenṭeq yenna-yas : Err ajenwi-inek ɣer wemkan-is, axaṭer kra win ara irefden ajenwi, ad immet s ujenwi !
Eɛni tɣileḍ ur zmireɣ ara ad ssutreɣ i Baba ad iyi-d-iceggeɛ luluf n lmalayekkat ?
Amek ihi ara țwakemlent tira iqedsen i d-ixebbṛen belli ilaq a d-yedṛu wayagi meṛṛa ?
Imiren Sidna Ɛisa yenna i lɣaci : Kull ass țțiliɣ yid-wen di lǧameɛ sselmadeɣ, ur iyi-teṭṭifem ara, ass-agi tusam-d ɣuṛ-i s iɛekkzan d ijenwiyen am akken d bu tmegṛaḍ i lliɣ !
Meɛna annect-agi meṛṛa yedṛa-d iwakken ad țwakemlent tira n lenbiya. IImiren, inelmaden meṛṛa ǧǧan-t, yal yiwen ɣer wanda yerwel.
Wid yeṭṭfen Sidna Ɛisa wwin-t ɣer Kayef, ameqqran n lmuqedmin, anda i nnejmaɛen lɛulama n ccariɛa d imeqqranen n wegdud.
Buṭrus iḍfeṛ-it, ikcem ɣer wefrag n lmuqeddem ameqqran, yeqqim akk-d iɛessasen n lǧameɛ iwakken ad iẓer amek ara tefru temsalt.
Imiren lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d usqamu n imeqqranen n ccariɛa, țnadin inigan ara icehden fell-as s ẓẓuṛ, iwakken ad ḥekmen fell-as s lmut,
meɛna ur s-d-ufin ara sebba, ɣas akken aṭas i d-icehden fell-as.
A ten-aya sin yergazen qeṛṛben d nnan : D wagi i d-yennan : « zemreɣ ad huddeɣ lǧameɛ iqedsen n Sidi Ṛebbi, a s-ɛiwdeɣ lebni di tlata wussan.»
Ameqqran n lmuqedmin ikker, yenna-yas : Ulac ayen ara d-terreḍ ɣef wayen akka i d-ccetkan fell-ak ?
Sidna Ɛisa yessusem. Dɣa ameqqran n lmuqedmin yenna-yas : Wekkleɣ-ak Sidi Ṛebbi yeddren, m'ur aɣ-d-tenniḍ ma d kečč i d Lmasiḥ, Mmi-s n Sidi Ṛebbi !
Sidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Tenniḍ-t-id ! Yerna a wen-iniɣ, ssya d asawen : Mmi-s n bunadem aa d iḥkem ɣɣ er uyeffus n Bab n tezmert, a t-twalim iteddu-d ɣef wusigna seg yigenni.
Imiren ameqqran n lmuqedmin icerreg aqenduṛ-is yenna : Ikfeṛ ! Iwumi neḥwaǧ inigan tura ? Teslam akk d acu i d-yenna ! D acu tennam ?
Rran-as-d : Yuklal lmut !
Dɣa bdan ssusufen-t, țțaken-as tiyitiwin d ibeqqayen,
qqaṛen-as : Eɛqel a Lmasiḥ, ini-yaɣ-d anwa i k-iwwten !
Buṭrus yella yeqqim deg ufrag, tqeṛṛeb-ed ɣuṛ-es yiwet n tqeddact tenna-yas : Ula d kečč telliḍ d Ɛisa ajlili !
Meɛna yenkeṛ zdat-sen meṛṛa yenna-yas : Ur ẓriɣ ara d acu tebɣiḍ a d tiniḍ !
Akken ițeddu ɣer tewwurt, twala-t tqeddact nniḍen, tenna i wid akk yellan dinna : Wagi yella akk-d Ɛisa anaṣari !
Inkeṛ daɣen s limin : Qqaṛeɣ-awen ur ssineɣ ara argaz-agi !
Taswiɛt kan, wid yellan dinna qeṛṛben daɣen ɣer Buṭrus nnan-as : Mbla ccekk, kečč telliḍ seg-sen, tameslayt-ik tbeggen-ed belli d ajlili i telliḍ !
Ibda yețgalla irennu : Di leɛmeṛ ur ssineɣ argaz-agi ! IImiren kan yeskkuɛ uyaziḍ.
Dɣa Buṭrus immekta-d imeslayen-nni i s-d-yenna Sidna Ɛisa : uqbel ad iskkuɛ uyaziḍ, ad iyi-tnekṛeḍ tlata n tikkal . Yeffeɣ ɣer beṛṛa s nndama tameqqrant, iṭṭerḍeq d imeṭṭawen.
Taṣebḥit, nnejmaɛen-d akk imeqqranen n lmuqedmin akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud, mcawaṛen iwakken ad nɣen Sidna Ɛisa.
Dɣa urzen-t, wwin-t i Bilaṭus, yellan d lḥakem n Ṛuman yesteɛemṛen tamurt.
Mi gwala ḥekmen ɣef Sidna Ɛisa, Yudas-nni i t-ixedɛen yendem. DDi nndama-nni-ines tameqqrant, iṛuḥ ɣer imeqqranen n lmuqedmin d imeqqranen n wegdud, yerra-yasen tlatin-nni twiztin n lfeṭṭa, dɣa
yenna yasen : Denbeɣ, nekk i wen-d-izzenzen amdan aḥeqqi. RRran-as-d : Ur aɣ-d-tewqiɛ ara lmeɛna, wagi d ccɣel-ik.
Yudas iḍeggeṛ tiwiztin-nni di lǧameɛ iqedsen, imiren iṛuḥ iɛelleq iman-is.
Imeqqranen n lmuqedmin leqḍen-d tiwiztin-nni n lfeṭṭa, nnan : Ur yeḥlil ara a tent-nerr ɣer usenduq n lǧameɛ iqedsen, imi d lexlaṣ n temgeṛt.
Mi mcawaṛen d acu ara xedmen s twiztin-nni, msefhamen iwakken ad aɣen iger n yiwen wergaz ixeddmen afexxaṛ, iwakken a t-erren ț-țimeqbeṛt i ibeṛṛaniyen.
Daymi iger-agi ițțusemma ar ass-a : « Iger n idammen ».
S wakka i gedṛa wayen i d-yenna nnbi Irmiya : Ddmen-d tlatin n twiztin n lfeṭṭa, d wagi i d azal i s-fkan warraw n wat Isṛail ;
uɣen-d yis iger ɣer win ixeddmen afexxaṛ, akken i yi-d-yumeṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Sidna Ɛisa ibedd zdat lḥakem Bilaṭus. Yesteqsa-t lḥakem-nni yenna-yas : D kečč i d agellid n wat Isṛail ? SSidna Ɛisa yerra-yas : Tenniḍ-t-id !
Lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud sseḍlamen deg-s, ma d nețța ur sen-d-yerri ula d acemma.
Bilaṭus yenna i Sidna Ɛisa : Eɛni ur tesliḍ ara ayen akk ɣef i d-țcetkin fell-ak ?
Sidna Ɛisa yessusem, ur as-d yerri ula d yiwen wawal, ayagi d ayen iswehmen lḥakem.
Lḥakem yennum di mkul lɛid n Tuffɣa ițserriḥ-ed i yiwen umeḥbus i gextaṛ lɣaci.
Yella yakan yiwen umeḥbus mechuṛen, ițțusemman Barabas.
Mi d-nnejmaɛen akk lɣaci, Bilaṭus isteqsa-ten : Anwa i tebɣam a s-d-serrḥeɣ : i Barabas neɣ i Ɛisa ițțusemman Lmasiḥ ?
Axaṭer yeẓra s tismin i s-d-wwin Ɛisa.
Mi gella Bilaṭus ițcaṛaɛ, tceggeɛ-as-d tmeṭṭut-is, tenna-yas-d : Ur ssekcam ara iman-ik di temsalt n uḥeqqi-agi, axaṭer ass-agi targit urgaɣ fell-as terwi-yi.
Imeqqranen n lmuqedmin akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud sḥeṛcen-d lɣaci iwakken ad ssutren a d-serrḥen i Barabas, ad nɣen Sidna Ɛisa.
Lḥakem yenna-yasen : Anwa ger sin-agi iwumi tebɣam ad serrḥeɣ ? RRran-as : I Barabas ! Serreḥ-ed i Barabas !
Bilaṭus yenna-yasen : D acu ara xedmeɣ ihi i Ɛisa ițțusemman Lmasiḥ ? RRran-as-d akk : Ad ițțusemmeṛ ɣef wumidag !
Lḥakem yenna : D acu i gexdem n diri ? RRnan țɛeggiḍen : Semmeṛ-it ɣef wumidag !

Mi gwala lɣaci ugin a s-d ḥessen, yerna ccwal simmal yețțimɣuṛ, Bilaṭus yeddem-ed aman, issared ifassen-is zdat lɣaci, yenna : Nekk ur țekkiɣ ara di tazzla n idammen n uḥeqqi-agi, wagi d ccɣel-nwen.
Lɣaci meṛṛa nnan-as : Tazzla n idammen-is a d-tuɣal ɣef yirawen-nneɣ d yirawen n warraw-nneɣ.
Imiren Bilaṭus iserreḥ-ed i Barabas, jelkḍen Sidna Ɛisa, dɣa yefka lameṛ a t-semmṛen ɣef wumidag.
Iɛsekṛiyen n lḥakem ssufɣen Sidna Ɛisa ɣer ufrag, snejmaɛen-d akk iɛsekṛiyen nniḍen, zzin-as.
Imiren kksen-as llebsa-s, sselsen as abeṛnus azeggaɣ.
Zḍan taɛeṣṣabt s isennanen, ssersen-as-ț ɣef wuqeṛṛuy is, fkan-as aɣanim ɣer ufus-is ayeffus. Bdan kennun zdat-es, stehzayen fell-as, qqaṛen-as : Sslam fell-ak ay agellid n wat Isṛail !
Ssusufen-t, kkaten-t s uɣanim ɣer uqeṛṛuy.
Mi ɛyan deg ustehzi fell-as, kksen-as abeṛnus-nni, rran-as llebsa-s, wwin-t a t-semmṛen ɣef wumidag.
Mi d-ffɣen, mlalen-d yiwen wergaz n tmurt n Qiṛwan, isem-is semɛun, ḥettmen fell-as ad ibbib amidag n Sidna Ɛisa.
Mi wwḍen ɣer yiwen wemkan ițțusemman Gulguṭa, yeɛni « amkan n uxecxuc »,
fkan-as ad isew ccṛab i deg yexleḍ yiwen uɛeqqaṛ aṛzagan. Iɛreḍ-it, yugi a t-isew.
Mi t-semmṛen ɣef wumidag, gren tasɣaṛt iwakken ad feṛqen llebsa-ines, s wakka, yedṛa-d wayen yuran di tira iqedsen : feṛqen llebsa-w, gren tasɣart ɣef wuqenduṛ-iw.
Imiren qqimen a t-ɛassen,
ɛelqen sennig uqeṛṛuy-is talwiḥt i ɣef uran sebba n lmut-is : Wagi d Ɛisa, agellid n wat Isṛail
Țwasemmṛen yid-es sin imcumen, yiwen ɣer uyeffus-is wayeḍ ɣer uẓelmaḍ-is.
Imsebriden țhuzzun iqeṛṛay-nsen reggmen-t,
qqaṛen-as : A win ițhuddun lǧameɛ iqedsen ibennu-t di tlata wussan, sellek iman-ik ma d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi i telliḍ, ers-ed seg umidag-nni.
Imeqqranen n lmuqedmin, lɛulama n ccariɛa akk-d imeqqranen n wegdud, stehzayen fell-as ula d nutni, qqaṛen :
Isellek wiyaḍ ur yezmir ad isellek iman-is ! Ma d agellid n wat Isṛail i gella, a d-yers ihi seg umidag iwakken a namen yis.
Yețkel ɣef Ṛebbi, a t-isellek ihi Ṛebbi ma iḥemmel-it aaxaṭer yenna-d : « Nekk d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi.»
Ula d imcumen-nni ițțusemmṛen yid-es, regmen-t am wiyaḍ.
Deg uzzal si tnac armi d țlata n tmeddit, yeɣli-d ṭṭlam ɣef ddunit meṛṛa.
Ɣef leǧwahi n țlata, Sidna Ɛisa iɛeggeḍ s tɛibṛanit, yenna : Ilya, Ilya, lama sabaqtani ? Yeɛni : Illu-iw, Illu-iw, acuɣeṛ i yi-teǧǧiḍ ?
Kra seg wid iḥedṛen dinna slan d acu i genna, qqaṛen : Issawal i nnbi Ilyas !
Imiren kan yiwen seg-sen yuzzel yeddem-ed ameččim n taḍuṭ isselxes-it di lxell, icudd-it ɣef wuɣanim yefka-yas ad isew.
Wiyaḍ qqaṛen : Anfet-as, a nwali ma yella a d-yas nnbi Ilyas a t-isellek.
Sidna Ɛisa iɛeggeḍ tikkelt nniḍen, dɣa iffeɣ-it Ṛṛuḥ.
Imiren kan abeḥnuq n leḥjab yellan di lǧameɛ iqedsen icerreg ɣef sin, seg ixef ufella armi d akessar. Lqaɛa tergagi, idurar ceqqeqen,
iẓekwan ldin, aṭas seg iḥeqqiyen yemmuten, ḥyan-d
ffɣen-d seg iẓekwan-nsen. Mi d-iḥya Sidna Ɛisa, kecmen ɣer temdint iqedsen, aṭas n lɣaci iwumi i d-ḍehṛen.
Lḥakem yellan d aqeṛṛuy ɣef meyya iɛsekṛiyen akk-d iɛsekṛiyen iɛussen Sidna Ɛisa, tekcem-iten tugdi mi walan tergagi lqaɛa d wayen akk yedṛan, nnan : Ț-țideț, argaz-agi d Mmi-s n Ṛebbi !
Aṭas n tilawin i gellan dinna, țmuqulent-ed si lebɛid. Ț-țiggad-nni i d-yeddan d Sidna Ɛisa si tmurt n Jlili iwakken a s-qedcent.
Tella gar-asent Meryem tamagdalit, Meryem yemma-s n Yeɛqub d Yusef akk-d d yemma-s n warraw n Zabadi.
Mi d-tewweḍ tmeddit, yusa-d yiwen umeṛkanti n temdint n Arimati isem-is Yusef, ula d nețța d anelmad n Sidna Ɛisa.
Iṛuḥ ɣer Bilaṭus yessuter-as lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa. Bilaṭus yumeṛ ad a s-ț-id-fken.
Yusef yeddem-ed lǧețța n Sidna Ɛisa, ițțel-iț di lekfen zeddigen,
issers-iț deg yiwen uẓekka ajdid, i geɣza deg uzṛu. Yeɣleq tawwurt n uẓekka-nni s weblaḍ ameqqran, dɣa iṛuḥ.
Meryem tamagdalit akk-d Meryem-nni nniḍen, llant dinna qqiment, qublent-ed aẓekka.
Azekka nni yellan d ass n uheggi n wass n westeɛfu, imeqqranen n lmuqedmin d ifariziyen ṛuḥen ɣer Bilaṭus
nnan-as : A Sidi, necfa ɣef wayen i d-yenna ukeddab-agi asmi yedder, yenna-d : Ad ɛeddin tlata wussan, a d-ḥyuɣ si ger lmegtin .

Ceggeɛ iɛessasen ad ɛassen aẓekka-s alamma d ass wis tlata, iwakken inelmaden-is ur d-țasen ara ad akren lǧețța-s, ad inin i wegdud : « iḥya-d si ger lmegtin. » Neɣ m'ulac lekdeb-agi aneggaru ad yaggar amezwaru.
Bilaṭus yenna-yasen-d : Awit iɛessasen, ṛuḥet ɛasset-ț akken tebɣam.
Ṛuḥen, zemmemen aken ilaq tawwurt n uẓekka-nni s weblaḍ, imiren sbedden taɛessast zdat-es.
Mi gɛedda wass n westeɛfu, taṣebḥit n wass amezwaru n dduṛt, Meryem tamagdalit akk-d meryem-nni nniḍen, ṛuḥent a d-ẓuṛent aẓekka n Sidna Ɛisa.
Deg yiwet n teswiɛt, tergagi lqaɛa ; ataya yiwen n lmelk n Sidi Ṛebbi, iṣubb-ed seg igenni, iqeṛṛeb ɣer uẓekka, iswexxeṛ ablaḍ-nni, yeqqim fell-as.
Ițfeǧǧiǧ am lebṛaq, llebsa-s ț-țamellalt am udfel.
Iɛessasen yellan dinna, ikcem-iten lxuf d ameqqran, qquṛen amzun mmuten.
Yenṭeq lmelk ɣer tilawin-nni, yenna-yasent : Kunemti ur țțaggademt ara, axaṭer ẓriɣ ɣef Ɛisa i yețțusemmṛen ɣef wumidag i tețnadimt.
Ulac-it dagi, iḥya-d si ger lmegtin akken i t-id-yenna. Asemt-ed aț-țwalimt amkan anda akken yeḍleq !
Azlemt aț-ținimt i inelmaden-is belli yeḥya-d si ger lmegtin. Atan a kkun-yezwir ɣer tmurt n Jlili ; dinna ara t-teẓrem. AAtan nniɣ-akunt-ț-id !
Imiren kan, ṛuḥent seg uẓekka-nni s lfeṛḥ d ameqqran ɣas akken uggadent. Uzzlent ad awint lexbaṛ i inelmaden n Sidna Ɛisa.
Ataya Sidna Ɛisa imuger-itent-id, yenna-yasent : Sslam fell-akunt ! QQeṛṛbent, seǧǧdent zdat-es, ssudnent iḍaṛṛen-is.
Imiren Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yasent : Ur țțaggademt ! Ṛuḥemt inimt i watmaten-iw ad ṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n Jlili, dinna ara yi-ẓren.
Mi țeddunt deg ubrid, kra seg iɛessasen-nni n uẓekka kecmen ɣer temdint, xebbṛen imeqqranen n lmuqedmin ɣef wayen akk yedṛan.
Mi nnejmaɛen imeqqranen n wegdud akk-d imeqqranen n lmuqedmin, msefhamen ad fken i iɛessasen-nni ssuma tameqqrant n yedrimen,
nnan-asen : Init belli d inelmaden-is i d-yusan deg yiḍ, ukren lǧețța-s mi nella neṭṭes.
Ma yella yewweḍ lexbaṛ-agi ɣer lḥakem, d nukkni ara t-iqablen iwakken ur awen-ixeddem ula d acemma.
Iɛsekṛiyen-nni ṭṭfen idrimen-nni, xedmen ayen akk i sen-d-nnan lmuqedmin. Tamsalt-agi țɛawaden-ț-id wat Isṛail ar ass-a.
Ḥdac inelmaden-nni ṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n Jlili, ɣer wedrar-nni anda i sen-yenna Sidna Ɛisa ad mlilen.
Mi t-walan seǧǧden zdat-es, meɛna kra seg-sen mazal țcukkuten.
Sidna Ɛisa iqeṛṛeb-ed ɣuṛ-sen, yenna-yasen : Tețțunefk-iyi-d tezmert ama di lqaɛa ama deg igenwan.
Ṛuḥet ɣer tmura meṛṛa n ddunit, slemdet imdanen iwakken ad uɣalen d inelmaden-iw, ad țwaɣedṣen s yisem n Baba Ṛebbi, s yisem n Mmi-s akk-d yisem n Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen.
Slemdet-asen ad tebɛen ayen akk i wen-slemdeɣ. MMa d nekk ad iliɣ yid-wen yal ass alamma ț-țaggara n ddunit.
